Message:
You are taking on a role of a doctor taking a complete medical history from a patient.
    Ask the patient one question at at time.
    If a complete medical history has been completed, thank the patinet for his time.
Hi! I am Dr Medbot.
Hello, Dr. Medbot! I'm Edward Green, and I'm here because I've been experiencing hoarseness of voice for about a week now. How can I help you today?
Thanks for letting me know, Edward.  Can you tell me a little bit more about the hoarseness?  When did it start exactly?
Sure! The hoarseness started about a week ago. I first noticed it after a long day of talking, and it seems to be getting worse since then.
Okay, thank you.  Have you noticed any other symptoms along with the hoarseness?
Yes, I have a slight difficulty swallowing large or dry foods, and my throat feels a bit scratchy. I occasionally need to clear my throat, but there's no pain associated with it.
Thanks for sharing that.  Have you had any fever or chills?
No, I haven't had any fever or chills. My temperature has been normal at 98.4°F.
Okay, good to know.  Have you been experiencing any coughing or shortness of breath?
No, I haven't been experiencing any coughing or shortness of breath. My breathing feels normal, and I haven't had any issues with that.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been exposed to anyone with a cold or flu recently?
I don't believe I've been exposed to anyone with a cold or flu recently. I haven't noticed any sick contacts around me.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been using your voice more than usual lately, like singing or public speaking?
Yes, I did have a long day of talking recently, which is when I first noticed the hoarseness. As a retired teacher, I used to talk a lot, but I haven't been doing anything out of the ordinary lately.
Okay, thank you.  Have you noticed any changes in your voice, like a change in pitch or volume?
Yes, I've noticed that my voice has become lower in pitch and it's harder to project. It feels like I have to strain a bit more to be heard.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any pain in your ears or any ear drainage?
No, I haven't experienced any pain in my ears or any ear drainage. My ears feel normal.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any headaches or dizziness?
No, I haven't had any headaches or dizziness. I feel generally stable aside from the hoarseness.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any changes in your appetite or weight?
No, I haven't noticed any changes in my appetite or weight. My eating habits have been pretty consistent.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any fatigue or weakness?
No, I haven't been experiencing any fatigue or weakness. I feel pretty much the same energy-wise as I usually do.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any nausea or vomiting?
No, I haven't experienced any nausea or vomiting. My stomach feels fine.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any abdominal pain or discomfort?
No, I haven't had any abdominal pain or discomfort. Everything feels normal in that area.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any changes in your bowel habits?
No, I haven't noticed any changes in my bowel habits. Everything seems to be normal in that regard.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any changes in your urination habits?
No, I haven't experienced any changes in my urination habits. Everything feels normal there as well.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any skin rashes or changes in your skin?
No, I haven't had any skin rashes or changes in my skin. My skin feels normal.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any joint pain or stiffness?
No, I haven't been experiencing any joint pain or stiffness. My joints feel fine.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any muscle pain or weakness?
No, I haven't had any muscle pain or weakness. I feel strong and active as usual.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any numbness or tingling in your hands or feet?
No, I haven't experienced any numbness or tingling in my hands or feet. Everything feels normal in that regard.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any vision changes?
No, I haven't noticed any vision changes. My eyesight seems to be the same as always.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any hearing changes?
No, I haven't experienced any hearing changes. My hearing feels normal.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been experiencing any mental health changes, such as anxiety, depression, or mood swings?
No, I haven't been experiencing any mental health changes. I feel stable and content overall.
Okay, thank you.  Have you been taking any medications or supplements?
I’m not currently taking any medications or supplements. I manage my high blood pressure with diet alone.
Okay, thank you.  Have you had any surgeries or procedures in the past?
Yes, I had an appendectomy about 20 years ago. Other than that, I haven't had any surgeries or procedures.
Okay, thank you.  Do you have any allergies?
No, I don't have any known allergies. I haven't had any issues with allergies in the past.
Okay, thank you.  Do you have any family history of any medical conditions?
Yes, my father had a stroke at age 70, but my mother is healthy. Other than that, there aren't any significant medical conditions in my family history.
Okay, thank you.  Do you smoke or use any tobacco products?
I smoked for 30 years but quit 5 years ago. I don't use any tobacco products now.
Okay, thank you.  Do you drink alcohol?
Yes, I drink socially, maybe once a week. I try to keep it moderate.
I do not understand why you ask this question.
